titleStmt.title: Philip Mornay, Lord of Plessis his teares For the death of his sonne. Vnto his wife Charlotte Baliste. Englished by Iohn Healey.
Lachrimae. English
titleStmt.author: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly, 1549-1623.
Healey, John, d. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, dwelling in Fleete-lane, at the signe of the Printers Presse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Du Plessis his teares.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Fleete-lane, at the signe of the Printers Presse
